    "number": 226041,
    "data": "41,263,50539,64007,151549,191953,205421,232357,252559,266027,272761,306431,326633,35035369,39039373,52386053,62396063,70404071,77077411,82416083,96430097,103103437,106440107,110444111",
    "name": "Primes generated by concatenation of three consecutive numbers divided by three.",
    "example": [
        "41 is in the list since concatenation of 1, 2 and 3 gives 123/3 = 41. Similarly concatenation of 15, 16 and 17 gives 151617 and 151617/3 = 50539, a prime."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[FromDigits[Flatten[IntegerDigits[n + Range[-1, 1]]]]/3, {n, 350}], PrimeQ]"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A001703."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,base",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Jayanta Basu_, May 24 2013",
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 7,
    "time": "2013-05-29T11:27:41-04:00",

}
